title: Master Elementalist Edition is confusing in the Store
body: It says that you get 10 icons on the Featured page, but the actual Bundle states that you only get 5 icons. I don't think this is how it's supposed to be.

replies.body:
Hey Ophelia Dusk -

While not optimal, this is working as intended. ;_; Since you unlock five of the icons when you purchase the skin itself, the Master Edition only registers as your account needing to be granted five icons. The five icons you get when you unlock the skin are considered perks, not something that is available in the store.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=MWnyNsTV,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-12-08T01:33:58.475+0000)
>
> Hey Ophelia Dusk -
> 
> While not optimal, this is working as intended. ;_; Since you unlock five of the icons when you purchase the skin itself, the Master Edition only registers as your account needing to be granted five icons. The five icons you get when you unlock the skin are considered perks, not something that is available in the store.

Thanks for the clarification. So basically, Elementalist Lux itself unlocks you 5 icons, Lux and the skin, whereas the Master Edition unlocks you multiple content alongside the Elementalist Lux skin itself. Then it wasn't a mistake, but instead a misunderstanding I guess. Thanks anyway! {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

> [{quoted}](name=Ophelia Dusk,realm=EUW,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=MWnyNsTV,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2016-12-08T13:24:32.852+0000)
>
> Thanks for the clarification. So basically, Elementalist Lux itself unlocks you 5 icons, Lux and the skin, whereas the Master Edition unlocks you multiple content alongside the Elementalist Lux skin itself. Then it wasn't a mistake, but instead a misunderstanding I guess. Thanks anyway! {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

Sorry this was so confusing!

It's fine. Thanks for the clarification!

Of course! :)
I've Noticed that also. Maybe it is a bug? Least I'd hope it is. Otherwise it hits false advertising to some degree. Hopefully they fix that...
